name: POLY (Early Access)
description:
POLY is a little survival game I made because me and my friends have nothing to play and I can just add whatever they want on the spot lmao. Currently only out for windows and is in very early access.

There's another, earlier version of the game posted on the other account PRISM Games (formerly LiquidCrystalGames). Just don't get them mixed up and this is the real one.  Older versions of the game are available on that page.

Beta 3.2: 

-Added features for smeltery and workbench

-Added copper pickaxe and hatchet

-Added ambient leave particles that disappear during night time

-Added item name above hotbar

-Planks are crafted with 2 bark and result in a 2 plank output

-Stone pickaxe and axe crafted at workbench (be in the range of it to craft it)

-Added stone dagger (does nothing atm)

-Pebbles dont do 999 damage

-Copper and iron bars crafted at smeltery (be in the range of it to craft it)

Beta 3.1:

-Added Smeltery Model

-Added Various Metals

-Added Various Metal Nodes

-Pebbles dont do 999 damage

-Added recipes for copper and iron ingots

-Added some film grain and changed day/night cycle ambient lighting

-Changed stone pickaxe and axe recipe

Beta 3:

Multiplayer experimentation build powered by Photon PUN, unavailable due to bugs and problems with the framework. May come back to MP in the future.
